data.name: User Experience & Design Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's User Experience & Design Center of Excellence delivers comprehensive UX design, research, and digital product innovation services. The CoE focuses on human-centered design methodologies, creating exceptional digital experiences that drive customer satisfaction and business growth. With expertise in design systems, user research, interface design, experience strategy, and usability testing, this unified CoE helps organizations build products that users love while achieving measurable business outcomes through design-led innovation and customer-centric approaches.

data.businessValue: Accion's User Experience & Design Center of Excellence delivers significant business value through improved customer satisfaction (40-60% increase in NPS scores), enhanced conversion rates (25-45% improvement), reduced development costs through systematic design approaches (30-40% efficiency gains), decreased customer support inquiries (50-70% reduction), and accelerated time-to-market through validated design solutions. The unified CoE enables organizations to create customer-centric experiences that drive engagement, loyalty, and sustainable business growth through design excellence and innovation.
